sentences.en: Birds roost in [ on ] the trees.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿 栖 在树上.

sentences.en: Curse came home to roost, Mammy said.
sentences.cn: 嬷嬷曾说过,凡是诅咒都要回到诅咒的人自己身上来.

sentences.en: Curses came home to roost, Mammy said.
sentences.cn: 如嬷嬷说的,诅咒别人的人必定自作自受.
诅咒他人,反而应验到自己身上.

sentences.en: for the overextended borrowers, the chickens have come home to roost.
sentences.cn: 冒过大风险的借款人现在自作自受了。

sentences.en: Her selfishness will come home to roost someday.
sentences.cn: 她的自私总有一天会得到报应.

sentences.en: In this house grandfather rules the roost.
sentences.cn: 祖父在这所房子里当家作主

sentences.en: Instinct led the pigeons back to the roost.
sentences.cn: 鸽子的本能使它们返回鸽棚.

sentences.en: Look! There is a roost in this tree.
sentences.cn: 看! 这棵树上有个鸟巢.

sentences.en: Now the chickens were coming home to roost.
Politicians can fool some people some of the time, but in the end, the chickens will come home to roost.
sentences.cn: 政客们有时能够愚弄一些人，但最终他们都会自食恶果。

sentences.en: Something disturbed the bird on its roost.
sentences.cn: 什么东西惊扰了那只栖息的鸟。

sentences.en: The consequences of her misdeeds eventually came home to roost.
sentences.cn: 她的不良行为所产生的后果最终回报到她自己身上了

sentences.en: The eaves of this deserted house have become the roost for pigeons.
sentences.cn: 这所无人住的房子的屋檐成了鸽子的歇息处.

sentences.en: The noise alarmed the whole roost into flight.
sentences.cn: 那闹声把一群栖息着的鸟吓得都飞走了.

sentences.en: The peacocks roost in nearby shrubs.
sentences.cn: 孔雀栖息在附近的灌木丛里。

sentences.en: Tommy is very bossy; he always wants to rule the roost.
sentences.cn: 汤米很专横, 他总是想一切由他支配.

sentences.en: You should not have sold the car in that unsafe condition ; sooner or later your misdeeds will come home to roost.
sentences.cn: 你不该把那辆不安全的车卖掉, 你的不端行为迟早会得到报应.

phrases.tran_cn: 后果，恶报：尤指有不幸的间接影响或后果

phrases.phrase: curses, like chickens, come home to roost
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)做错事（或坏事）会有报应，自作自受

trans.tran_cn: 栖木，鸡棚，（鸟类）栖息处，歇息处
trans.tran_en: a place where birds rest and sleep
if a bird roosts, it rests or sleeps somewhere
a place where birds rest and sleep

trans.tran_cn: 栖息，过去事情的恶果显现出来，自食恶果，得到报应
trans.tran_en: if a bird roosts, it rests or sleeps somewhere
